lead_paragraph: Jaromir Jagr offered a brief wave to the Dallas crowd during a video tribute to Florida's 44-year-old forward in the first period.

headline.main: Jagr Scores 756th Career Goal as Panthers Beat Stars 3-1
headline.print_headline: Jagr Scores 756th Career Goal as Panthers Beat Stars 3-1
